description: Discover this delightfully spacious, non-strata half-duplex featuring four bedrooms and four bathrooms, ideal for growing families in Burke Mountain. The main floor boasts an open layout enhanced by large windows and high ceilings, alongside a kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. Plenty of outdoor space with a private balcony and a lower-level patio & yard. The upper level comprises three sun-filled bedrooms, including a primary suite with a walk-in closet and an ensuite bathroom. The lower level presents a recreation room, a fourth bedroom or flexible space, and an additional full bathroom. This property includes a single garage and extra parking. Convenient access to schools, trails, parks, and public transit.
